title: 92/91/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 February 1992 on certain protective measures with respect to scallops originating in Japan
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 6 February 1992  on certain protective measures with respect to scallops originating in Japan  (92/91/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall prohibit the importation of consignments of great scallops, variegated scallops, queen scallops and other bivalve molluscs of the Pectinidae family originating in Japan.
The Commission will monitor the development of the situation and this Decision will be amended in the light of such development.
This Decision shall enter into force on the 30th day following its notification.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 February 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
